name: Derrick & Doris
description:
Derrick and Doris is a Rogue Like inspired game that has its own unique twist.

You have the option to play Derrick or Doris, two 80 something lovers that were separated by their awful children and locked in a Residential Home. Fight through the levels against the evil staff and collect the Polaroids to help reveal your lost memories. Search for your love and be reunited at last.

The game is still in development. All feedback is welcome. Submitted as part of module 2 for MA Indie Game Development at Falmouth University.
